imagelistselector.missingpagelink: javascript:alert('The page could not be found. Please advise the web master.');return false;
imagelistselector.clearconfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the selected links?

pagetext.title: Image List And Flash Selection
pagetext.introduction:
This control allows you to create a list of objects consist of an image and a link (either EPiServer or external).

This control also supports adding flash objects. When uploading a flash object, you need to specify the height and width.

Use the buttons below to add new pair (image and a link), or a flash object.
pagetext.errormessage: Please specify both Image and Page Link!

imagecreator.title: Linked Image Wizard
imagecreator.introduction: This control allows you to create an object consist of an image and a link to the either EPServer page or external website.
imagecreator.heading: Link

flashcreator.title: Flash Resource Wizard
flashcreator.introduction: This control allows you to upload a flash object, and specify its height and width. Any links need to be handled inside the flash itself.
flashcreator.heading: Flash settings

button.moveupalt: Moves the object up one position in the list
button.movedownalt: Moves the object down one position in the list
button.deletealt: Removes the object from the list

errormessage.heightwidtmissing: Height and Width must be specified for a flash resource
